channel.title: [CLIENT][IP]Help adding ip
channel.description:
On my client i got this options
Username : Password :
And i can change ip adress in there. How can i add under password : ip :
Because if i press enter when i'm on the textbox of password i can change ip adress how i make that visible so i see what ip i change:S

item.title: [CLIENT][IP]Help adding ip
item.dc:creator: @joeyjoe9876 joeyjoe9876
item.description:
@joeyjoe9876 wrote:

ok in client.java search

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffff, "Username: "

or just "username

and under the password one add

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Server IP: " + server + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15; i beleive

Read full topic
